${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.NAME: Frontloaded Bash
${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals 1 more damage for every !M! 牌 in your 抽牌堆。
${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals 1 more damage for every !M! 牌 in your 抽牌堆。 NL 抽一张牌。

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill card. NL Add copy of that card 加入手牌。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Preparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill card. NL Add copy of that card 加入手牌。

${ModID}:SmallAdaptation.NAME: Small Adaptation
${ModID}:SmallAdaptation.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Choose 一张牌 that costs 1 or 0. NL Add a copy of that card 加入手牌。

${ModID}:ExperimentalMerge.NAME: Experimental Merge
${ModID}:ExperimentalMerge.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Shuffle your 弃牌堆 into your 抽牌堆。 抽 !M! 。

${ModID}:消耗性Work.NAME: 消耗性 Work
${ModID}:消耗性Work.DESCRIPTION: {@@}抽 !M! 张牌{!M!|>1=s}. NL Choose 一张牌。 NL 消耗 that card 并add a copy of it to your 抽牌堆。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 一张牌 to 消耗 并copy。

${ModID}:IterativeDesign.NAME: Iterative Design
${ModID}:IterativeDesign.DESCRIPTION: 每当 your create 一张牌 本场战斗, 获得 !M! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:Xpansion.NAME: Xpansion
${ModID}:Xpansion.DESCRIPTION: 获得 X ${ModID}:Duplication. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:ReduceOverhead.NAME: Reduce Overhead
${ModID}:ReduceOverhead.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 ALL 牌 that have duplicates. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害 for each card 消耗ed. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:MagicHand.NAME: Magic Hand
${ModID}:MagicHand.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! 牌 from your master deck to add 加入手牌。 NL 本回合其下次耗能为0 并消耗s。
${ModID}:MagicHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! 牌 from your master deck to add 加入手牌。 NL 本回合其下次耗能为0。

${ModID}:EnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
${ModID}:EnergyDrink.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! stslib:Temporary_生命。 获得 1 ${ModID}:Duplication for every 10 牌 you shuffle into your 抽牌堆。
